name: Healthtyfied Kimchi Curry Soup
description: Indulge in the harmonious blend of flavors with our Healthtyfied Kimchi Curry Soup. This recipe is a perfect balance for those looking for a high-protein, low-carb, low-sugar, and high-fiber meal. Elevate your dining experience with a dish that not only promises a healthful journey but also embodies the essence of Healthyfied cooking.

recipeInstructions.text: Mince the garlic and ginger, and chop the white onion.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 1

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the beef tenderloin into thin strips.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 2

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pot, heat a tablespoon of oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic, ginger, and chopped onion, sautéing until they are soft and fragrant, about 5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 3

recipeInstructions.text: Add the curry powder to the pot and stir well to combine with the sautéed ingredients, cook for 1 minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 4

recipeInstructions.text: Increase the heat to medium-high and add the beef tenderloin strips. Cook until they are just browned, about 3-5 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 5

recipeInstructions.text: Pour in the unsweetened coconut milk and add the red, sweet bell pepper. Bring the mixture to a simmer, then reduce the heat to maintain the simmer for about 15 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 6

recipeInstructions.text: Add the kimchi to the pot and continue to simmer for another 10 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 7

recipeInstructions.text: In a separate pot, cook the noodles according to package instructions until tender, then drain.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 8

recipeInstructions.text: Serve the curry soup over the cooked noodles.
recipeInstructions.name: Step 9
